text_blocks: I'm getting repeated errors. Based on the rules, I notice that my department is "External". As an External user, I have limited access. Let me check the access rules - External users cannot access employee data.

input.message: I'm unable to access employee information. As an external user, I don't have permission to view employee data, including workload information for Human Resources staff. This information is restricted to internal employees. Please contact HR directly or reach out to an internal staff member who can assist with this request.
